column1: Little Goat Diner////The Chee vinaigrette is pungent and unique flavor i've never tasted before
column2: but Counteracts with the chickpea ball that's mild and light while Tzatziki sauce enhances the chickpea with its creaminess. The is quick pickled onions add a crunchy bite. The "bowl" just makes you go around in circles. And each component builds on each other to make you want more
